main

Class OperationSahure

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.OperationSahure

  • public class OperationSahure
extends java.lang.Object
    Runs simulation to determine which arrest scenarios return the maximum assets.
    Author:
    Bryan J Sanchez

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Program's main method. Gets list of cases and generates an output file with results for each case.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments.

      • analyzeCase

        private static void analyzeCase(int caseNumber,
                                Case currentCase)
        Analyzes a case and generates an output file containing the arrests which will lead to the maximum assets recovery.
        Parameters:
        currentCase - Case to be analyzed.
        caseNumber - Number which will identify the output file for this case.

      • getCurrentNetwork

        private static PyramidNetwork getCurrentNetwork(Case currentCase)
                                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets PyramidNetwork connected to the current case being analyzed.
        Parameters:
        currentCase - Case to be analyzed.
        Returns:
        Returns PyramidNetwork connected to the case being analyzed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Input file is invalid for this case.

      • generateAllScenarios

        private static java.util.ArrayList<Scenario> generateAllScenarios(int maxArrests,
                                                                  PyramidNetwork pyramidNetwork)
        Generates a list of all possible arrest scenarios.
        Parameters:
        maxArrests - Maximum number of arrests possible.
        pyramidNetwork - The pyramid network related to the current case being analyzed.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of all possible arrest scenarios.

      • recursiveArrest

        private static java.util.ArrayList<Scenario> recursiveArrest(java.util.ArrayList<Scenario> scenarioList,
                                                             int remainingArrests)
        Creates a new scenario for each of the possible arrests that can be made. A different scenario is created for each of the members that the last arrested member can reveal.
        Parameters:
        scenarioList - The list containing the members that have been arrested so far.
        remainingArrests - The number of arrests that can still be made.
        Returns:
        Returns a list with all the possible scenarios that are possible so far.
